description: Program to extract 1 row from a dataset and write it as a .1D file

xrow.title: X direction row extraction
xrow.description: Extract row along the x-direction at fixed y-index of j and fixed z-index of k

yrow.title: Y direction row extraction
yrow.description: Extract row along the y-direction at fixed x-index of i and fixed z-index of k

zrow.title: Z direction row extraction
zrow.description: Extract row along the z-direction at fixed x-index of i and fixed y-index of j

input_file.title: Input File
input_file.description: Read input from dataset 'ddd' (instead of putting dataset name at end of command line)

output_file.title: Output File
output_file.description: Filename for output .1D ASCII file will be 'ff' (if 'ff' is '-', then output is to stdout, the default)
